Aggie 101 opens on May 3, 2023 for first-year students! Be sure to create your UC Davis email address so you can log into the program.





 



Welcome to UC Davis Orientation!

A three-part experience to get you started at UC Davis


Play Video
Learn About Orientation

















Welcome New Aggies!
Congratulations on your admission to UC Davis, where the most innovative ideas come from the most diverse minds. Here, you will be welcomed like family—and challenged to think about a future that hasn’t been thought of before.
To help you prepare for a great first year, we have planned a comprehensive UC Davis Orientation experience in three mandatory parts. Be sure to read through the information about all three, including cost and financial assistance, in order to be prepared for your first quarter at UC Davis!





 

Step 1


Aggie 101
Learn about UC Davis resources, explore your Aggie community, and prepare to arrive on campus - all online.
Start now!






 

Step 2


Aggie Advising
Receive academic Aggie Advising remotely in preparation for course schedule planning and registration.
Make a plan!






 

Step 3


Aggie Orientation
Get excited about being an Aggie! Build community networks, find resources, and begin your life at UC Davis during our four day Aggie Orientation program.
Get excited!
